text: I was perusing the local churches near my hotel and came across this one that intrigued me. Their website page ‘About Us’ curiously has only two items they stand for - one on the charismatic movement and the other on homosexuality. How weird! I’d hope that the so-called Christians there focus instead on compassion, service, and community building, not issues that divide and exclude!
Recommend for those who just arrived from Hong Kong and need a Cantonese community. Join fellowships and it would be easier to join in.
Nice, simple worship place without the hypes. Love the atmosphere here. Locals and HK migrant families who came to SG for many years. A very pure and welcoming culture.
Didn't get a chance to enter, Nice outlook peaceful feel
Good church to have a devoted time
